body.p: Kentucky native. Married to Elizabeth Seamands Gray. Father of James M. Gray, George W. Gray, Fielding "Fielder" W. Gray, Madison H. Gray, and Elizabeth M. Gray. Veteran of the War of 1812. Farmer in Fleming County in 1860. Owned two enslaved persons in 1850 and four in 1860. Justice of the peace for Hillsboro District No. 4 in Fleming County in 1865.
